LanguageData.ShipCrashCoreSW.label: crashsite
LanguageData.ShipCrashCoreSW.description: The approximate place a spaceship came down.
LanguageData.HiveCrashCoreSW.label: crashsite
LanguageData.HiveCrashCoreSW.description: The approximate place a mechanoid hiveship came down. There will be surviving mechanoids at the crashsite. Proceed with caution.
LanguageData.ThrumboSightingCoreSW.label: thrumbo herd
LanguageData.ThrumboSightingCoreSW.description: The approximate place a herd of Thrumbos has gathered. They will stick around a few days and then move on.
LanguageData.PsychicEmitterCoreSW.label: psychic emitter
LanguageData.PsychicEmitterCoreSW.description: The site where the psychic waves are coming from. Destroying the emitter should end the current psychic drones.
LanguageData.TradeFairCoreSW.label: trade fair
LanguageData.TradeFairCoreSW.description: The place where a trade fair is happening. Multiple caravan traders will be present.
LanguageData.HuntingLodgeCoreSW.label: hunting lodge
LanguageData.HuntingLodgeCoreSW.description: The place where a herd of animals is gathering. Facilities to butcher, cook and sleep are present.
LanguageData.RaidOnArrivalSW.label: raid
LanguageData.RaidOnArrivalSW.description: An enemy faction will arrive here imminently.
LanguageData.HuntingPartyArrivalSW.label: hunting party
LanguageData.HuntingPartyArrivalSW.description: An enemy faction will arrive here imminently.
LanguageData.EmitterInsanityPulsSW.label: emitter insanity pulse
LanguageData.EmitterInsanityPulsSW.description: A pulse from the psychic emitter drove some animals in the area insane.
